questions.myth: Cases are going up because we are doing more testing.
questions.truth: The total is rising, but the share that are positive is also rising.

questions.myth: Herd Immunity works in the place of lockdowns.
questions.truth: Many deaths will occur before this is achieved.

questions.myth: COVID-19 is just like the flu.
questions.truth: This is four to eight times as serious.

questions.myth: Once you recover, you cannot spread Covid.
questions.truth: After symptoms subside, you might still spread Covid for up to eight days.
